description.message: Unblock any website and stay secure with VPN-free.pro. Easy use with one-click activation. VPN-free.pro - the best VPN!

start_page_not_close_text.message: Do not close this page until the installation is complete

start_page_manual.message: While the extension is being installed, please read the user manual

start_page_pin_subtitle.message: To quickly access the VPN, pin the extension to the toolbar.

start_page_pin_text.message:
1. Click on the puzzle piece icon in the upper right corner of your browser.
2. Locate the VPN-free.pro - Free Unlimited VPN extension in the list of extensions and pin it.

After pinning the extension, its action button will remain in the browser toolbar.

start_page_select_country_subtitle.message: Choose a country from the dropdown list of the VPN extension.

start_page_select_country_text.message:
1. Click on the VPN-free.pro extension icon on the toolbar to access the extension menu.
2. Select a VPN server from the available countries in the dropdown menu.

After selecting the VPN country, it will automatically connect to the server you've chosen.

start_page_disable_vpn_subtitle.message: Instantly turn off the VPN if you don't need it right now.

start_page_disable_vpn_text.message:
1. Click on the VPN-free.pro extension icon on the toolbar to access the extension menu.
2. Select Turn off VPN option from the dropdown menu.

After turning off the VPN, all your traffic will go directly.
When the VPN is turned off, the icon will be gray.

To reconnect, simply select a country from the list, and the extension will automatically connect to the server you've chosen.

start_page_support_subtitle.message: Support is always ready to assist you.

start_page_support_text.message:
1. Click on the VPN-free.pro extension icon on the toolbar to access the extension menu.
2. Click on the email address to send a request to customer support.

You can also send an email directly to our mailbox from any of your email addresses (Gmail, Hotmail, Yandex, and others).
We do not respond to questions asked in the reviews section of the Chrome Web Store.

start_page_error_dns_text.message:
Your provider is blocking DNS. Changing DNS settings is easy.

Change DNS or contact support at: support@free-vpn.pro

error_page_attention.message:
The extension failed to load properly. VPN may not work correctly.
Make sure your settings are selected as shown in the figure below:

error_page_description_text.message: Unblock any website and stay secure with VPN-free.pro. Easy use with one-click activation. VPN-free.pro - the best VPN!

error_page_access_text.message: Allow this extension to read and change all your data on websites you visit:

share_page_satisfied.message:
Thank you for choosing VPN-free.pro!

Are you satisfied with our application?

share_page_rate.message: Please give us a good rating on the Chrome Web Store:

share_page_mail.message: Write your comments and suggestions to the e-mail support@free-vpn.pro.

dns_page_h1_chrome.message: How to Set Up Secure DNS in Google Chrome

dns_page_p1_chrome.message: Click the or enter chrome://settings/security into your browser's address bar.

dns_page_p2_chrome.message: You can also open the above page manually: Menu → Settings → Privacy and security → Security.

dns_page_p4_chrome.message: Enable the Encrypt the names of sites that you visit.

dns_page_p5_chrome.message: Expand the options next to Select DNS provider, and select Google (Public DNS) or Cloudflare (1.1.1.1).

dns_page_h1_edge.message: How to Set Up Secure DNS in Microsoft Edge

dns_page_p1_edge.message: Click the or enter edge://settings/privacy into your browser's address bar.

dns_page_p2_edge.message: You can also open the above page manually: Menu → Settings → Privacy, search and services.

dns_page_p4_edge.message: Enable the Use secure DNS to specify how to lookup the network address for websites.

dns_page_p6_edge.message: Click an empty box and select Google (Public DNS) or Cloudflare (1.1.1.1).

dns_page_h1_yandex.message: How to Set Up Secure DNS in Yandex Browser

dns_page_p1_yandex.message: Click the or enter browser://protect into your browser's address bar.

dns_page_p2_yandex.message: You can also open the above page manually: Menu → Settings → Security.

dns_page_p3_yandex.message: Scroll down to the Secure connection section.

dns_page_p4_yandex.message: Enable the Use a secure DNS server.

dns_page_p5_yandex.message: Expand the options next to Use, and select Google (Public DNS) or Cloudflare (1.1.1.1).

start_text.message: Three simple steps left to complete the installation and access the full extension functionality

start_ext_menu_text.message:
To access the extension, click on the puzzle piece icon in the upper right corner of your browser.
After clicking on the icon, a menu opens with a list of all installed extensions.

start_ext_pin_text.message:
Opening the extension menu shows a list of extensions.
Each extension in the list has a pin icon on the right side of the menu. Clicking this icon pins the extension.
Once the extension is pinned, its action button remains in the toolbar.

start_ext_country_text.message:
After the extension is pinned you can use the full functionality.
Click the extension's icon and choose the country.
The extension will automatically connect to the selected server.
Enjoy Free-VPN.pro - Free Unlimited VPN.

Make sure you do not have another extension installed with proxy or VPN functionality.
If there are other installed extensions Free-VPN.pro may not work correctly.
